de.unlixx.runpng.png.io

Class PngProjectOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • java.io.FilterOutputStream
        • java.util.zip.DeflaterOutputStream
          • java.util.zip.ZipOutputStream
            • de.unlixx.runpng.png.io.PngProjectOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class PngProjectOutputStream
extends java.util.zip.ZipOutputStream
    PngProjectOutputStream based on ZipOutputStream. This class writes the PngProject content zipped to an output stream.

      • write

        public void write(PngProject project,
                  Progress<?> progress)
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  java.util.zip.DataFormatException
        Writes the given project contents to the zip output stream.
        Parameters:
        project - The PngProject object to write it's contents.
        progress - A Progress object to update the visual progress indicator.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case of an IO problem.
        java.util.zip.DataFormatException - In case of problems with the data format.

        Writes a text file to the zip output stream.
        Parameters:
        strText - A string containing the text.
        strFilename - The filename string.
        strComment - An optional comment string.
        progress - A Progress object to update the visual progress indicator.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case of an IO problem.
